payload: -----Original Message----- From: Bill C. Scott Sent: Tue 8/28/2001 5:14 PM To: lsoldano@enron.com; Melton, Richard Cc: Shafer, John; Jensen, Ruth Subject: NMED Compliance Order ** Proprietary ** Lou, I attach a draft of a chronology of events concerning the P-1 compressor station matter. I have tried to keep the chronology as short as possible. I have not included in this draft the dates that Transwestern applied for and received two modifications to the permit for the P-1. Transwestern applied for the first modification on July 26, 1996 to convert the P-1 from a regenerative cycle to a simple cycle and to include a 126 HP stand by generator. That permit modification was issued on February 21, 1997. Transwestern applied for the second modification on January 6, 1997.
